# Julia-themed Quarto

This website presents output from various Quarto extensions for Julia.

The [`quarto-julia`](https://github.com/pat-alt/quarto-julia) extension contributes various basic format templates and is also used to style this website.

The [`quarto-juliacon-proceedings`](https://github.com/pat-alt/quarto-juliacon-proceedings) extension adds support for writing a JuliaCon Proceedings article in Quarto.
